00013 #include "rob_can_public.h"

00015 const uint8_t AT90CAN_Bitrates[8][3] = 
00016 {
00017    // 10 kbps
00018    {  0x7E,
00019       0x6E,
00020       0x7F
00021    },
00022    // 20 kbps
00023    {  0x62,
00024       0x0C,
00025       0x37
00026    },
00027    // 50 kbps
00028    {  0x26,
00029       0x0C,
00030       0x37
00031    },
00032    // 100 kbps
00033    {  0x12,
00034       0x0C,
00035       0x37
00036    },
00037    // 125 kbps
00038    {  0x0E,
00039       0x0C,
00040       0x37
00041    },
00042    // 250 kbps
00043    {  0x06,
00044       0x0C,
00045       0x37
00046    },
00047    // 500 kbps
00048    {  0x02,
00049       0x0C,
00050       0x37
00051    },
00052    // 1 Mbps
00053    {  0x00,
00054       0x0C,
00055       0x37
00056    }
00057 };
00058 
00059 uint8_t CAN_init(CAN_bitrate bitrate)
00060 {
00061    uint8_t mob;
00062    
00063    // set to -1, no message received yet
00064    CAN_MSG_RECEIVED = -1;
00065    
00066    if (bitrate >= 8)
00067       return 0;
00068    
00069    // switch CAN controller to reset mode
00070    CANGCON |= (1 << SWRES);
00071    
00072    // reset all interrupt registers
00073    CANSIT2 = 0x00;
00074    CANSIT1 = 0x00;
00075    CANGIT  = 0x00;
00076    CANGIE  = 0x00;
00077    CANEN1  = 0x00;
00078    CANEN2  = 0x00;
00079    CANIE1  = 0x00;
00080    CANIE2  = 0x00;
00081    
00082    // reset all MObs
00083   for (mob = 0; mob < 15; mob++)
00084   { 
00085       CAN_get_mob(mob);
00086       CANIDT1 = 0x00;  //  reset ID-Tag
00087       CANIDT2 = 0x00;
00088       CANIDT3 = 0x00;
00089       CANIDT4 = 0x00;
00090 
00091       CANIDM1 = 0x00;  //  reset ID-Mask
00092       CANIDM2 = 0x00;
00093       CANIDM3 = 0x00;
00094       CANIDM4 = 0x00;
00095       
00096       // Disable MOb interrupt
00097       CAN_disable_mob_interrupt(mob); 
00098 
00099       CANSTMOB = 0x00;  //  reset MOb status
00100       CANCDMOB = 0x00;  //  disable MOb
00101   }
00102    
00103    
00104    // set CAN Bit Timing
00105    CANBT1 = AT90CAN_Bitrates[bitrate][0];
00106    CANBT2 = AT90CAN_Bitrates[bitrate][1];
00107    CANBT3 = AT90CAN_Bitrates[bitrate][2];
00108    
00109    // activate CAN transmit- and receive-interrupt
00110    CANGIE = ((1 << ENIT) | (1 << ENRX) | (1 << ENTX));
00111    
00112    // activate CAN controller
00113    CANGCON = (1 << ENASTB);
00114 
00115      //  wait for EnableFlag
00116   while (!(CANGSTA & (1<<ENFG))); 
00117    
00118    return 1;
00119 }
00120 
00121 uint8_t CAN_Configure_MOb(CAN_mob mob, CAN_msg *msg)
00122 {
00123    // check if MOb is already in use --> return 0
00124    if (mob < 8)
00125    {
00126       if(CANEN2 & (1 << mob))
00127          return 0;
00128    }
00129    else
00130    {
00131       if(CANEN1 & (1 << (mob - 8)))
00132          return 0;
00133    }
00134    
00135    // select MOb
00136    CAN_get_mob(mob);
00137    // Set DLC (Data Length Code) and data
00138    CAN_set_data(msg->length, msg->data);
00139    // set ID
00140    CAN_set_id(msg->id);
00141    // Set Mask
00142    CAN_set_id_mask(msg->msk);
00143 
00144    // Enable interrupts for MOb
00145    CAN_enable_mob_interrupt(mob);
00146 
00147    return 1;
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00151 /*
00152 |------------------------------------------------------------------|
00153 |CONMOB1 CONMOB0     |Reply Valid| RTR Tag   | Operating Mode      |
00154 |--------------------|-----------|-----------|---------------------|
00155 |0         0         |   x       |   x       | Disabled            |
00156 |--------------------|-----------|-----------|---------------------|
00157 |0         1         |   x       |   0       | Tx Data Frame       |
00158 |0         1         |   x       |   1       | Tx Remote Frame     |
00159 |--------------------|-----------|-----------|---------------------|
00160 |1         0         |   x       |   0       | Rx Data Frame       |
00161 |1         0         |   0       |   1       | Rx Remote Frame     |
00162 |1         0         |   1       |   1       | Rx Remote Frame,    |
00163 |                    |           |           | then Tx Data Frame  |
00164 |                    |           |           | (reply mode)        |
00165 |------------------------------------------------------------------|
00166 */
00167 // This functions assumes the MOb being properly configured!
00168 uint8_t CAN_MOb_action(CAN_mob mob, CAN_action action)
00169 {
00170    // select MOb
00171    CAN_get_mob(mob);
00172    
00173    switch(action)
00174    {
00175      case CMD_DISABLED:
00176        CANCDMOB = 0;
00177        CANIDT4  &= ~(1<<RTRTAG);
00178        CANIDM4  &= ~(1<<RTRMSK);
00179      break;
00180      //------------   
00181 
00182      case CMD_TX_DATA:
00183        // Disable MOb
00184        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00185 
00186        CANIDT4  &= ~(1<<RTRTAG);
00187        CANCDMOB &= ~(1<<RPLV);
00188        // Configure as TX
00189        CANCDMOB |= (1  << CONMOB0);
00190        break;
00191      //------------   
00192         
00193      case CMD_TX_REMOTE:       
00194        // Set RTR
00195        CANIDT4  |= (1  << RTRTAG);
00196        
00197        // Disable MOb
00198        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00199        // Configure as TX
00200        CANCDMOB |= (1  << CONMOB0);
00201        break;
00202      //------------  
00203             
00204      case CMD_RX_ALL:
00205        CANIDM1   = 0;
00206        CANIDM2   = 0;
00207        CANIDM4  |=  (1 << IDEMSK); // to receive only standard frames
00208        CANIDT4  &= ~(1 << RTRTAG);
00209        
00210        // Disable MOb
00211        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00212        // Configure as RX
00213        CANCDMOB |= (1  <<CONMOB1);
00214        break;
00215      //------------
00216 
00217      case CMD_RX_MASKED:
00218        CANIDM4  |=  (1 << IDEMSK); // to receive only standard frames
00219        CANIDT4  &= ~(1 << RTRTAG);
00220        
00221        // Disable MOb
00222        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00223        // Configure as RX
00224        CANCDMOB |= (1  <<CONMOB1);
00225        break;
00226      //------------  
00227           
00228      case CMD_RX_REMOTE:
00229        // Disable MOb
00230        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00231 
00232         CANIDM4  |= (1<<RTRMSK);
00233         CANIDT4  |= (1  << RTRTAG);
00234         CANCDMOB &= ~(1<<RPLV);
00235         CANIDM4  |=  (1 << IDEMSK); // to receive only standard frames
00236        
00237 
00238        // Configure as RX
00239        CANCDMOB |= (1  <<CONMOB1);
00240        break;
00241      //------------    
00242            
00243      case CMD_RX_REMOTE_MASKED:
00244        // Disable MOb
00245        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00246 
00247        CANIDM4  |= (1<<RTRMSK);
00248 
00249        CANCDMOB |= (1<<RPLV);
00250        CANIDM4  |=  (1 << IDEMSK); // to receive only standard frames
00251        
00252        // Configure as RX
00253        CANCDMOB |= (1  <<CONMOB1);
00254        break;
00255      //------------   
00256         
00257      case CMD_REPLY:
00258        // Disable MOb
00259        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00260        // Configure as RX
00261        CANCDMOB |= (1  <<CONMOB1);
00262        
00263        CANCDMOB |= (1<<RPLV);
00264        CANIDT4  |= (1<<RTRTAG);
00265        CANIDM4  |= (1<<RTRMSK); 
00266        CANIDM4  |= (1 << IDEMSK); // to receive only standard frames
00267        
00268        break;
00269      //------------    
00270        
00271      case CMD_REPLY_MASKED:
00272        // Disable MOb
00273        CANCDMOB &= ~((1<<CONMOB1)|(1<<CONMOB0));
00274        // Configure as RX
00275        CANCDMOB |= (1  <<CONMOB1);
00276 
00277        CANCDMOB |= (1<<RPLV);
00278        CANIDT4  |= (1<<RTRTAG);
00279        CANIDM4  |= (1<<RTRMSK); 
00280        CANIDM4  |= (1 << IDEMSK); // to receive only standard frames
00281        
00282        break;
00283      //------------     
00284       
00285      default:
00286        // not implemented command
00287        return 0;
00288        break;
00289      //------------
00290    }
00291    return 1;
00292 }
00293 
00294 void CAN_Copy_MOb(CAN_mob mob, CAN_msg *msg)
00295 {
00296    uint8_t i;
00297 
00298    // select MOb
00299    CAN_get_mob(mob);
00300 
00301    msg->id     = CAN_get_id();
00302    msg->length = CAN_get_dlc();
00303 
00304    // clear first
00305    for(i = 0; i < 8; i++)  
00306    {  
00307      msg->data[i] = 0;
00308    }
00309 
00310    for(i = 0; i < msg->length; i++)
00311    {
00312       msg->data[i] = CANMSG;
00313    }
00314 }
00315 
00316 void CAN_Reply_Ready(CAN_mob mob)
00317 {
00318    // select MOb
00319    CAN_get_mob(mob);
00320 
00321    // Restore RTRTAG and RPLV to 1, Auto Reply Mode
00322    CANIDT4  |= (1<<RTRTAG);
00323    CANCDMOB |= (1<<RPLV);
00324    
00325 }
